metadata.markdownDescription: Actual name of the meta as it's used in Haxe code.

doc.markdownDescription: Documentation for the meta that is shown in `--help-metas` and IDE hints.

platforms.markdownDescription: Platforms on which this meta has an effect.

devcomment.markdownDescription: Internal comment that is not exposed.

internal.markdownDescription: Whether this define is for internal use only, in which case it is not exposed to the CLI and the `--display` protocol.

targets.markdownDescription: On what the meta can be used.
